comment._content: So cute photo! I like the special stroller and the lovely baby! Most of the strollers on the market are too modern, but this one is very classical and fashionable. Would you please tell me where can I find or buy such a lovely stroller? Thank you for your sharing.

comment._content: So glad you like this image! It is a lovely stroller. I have no advice to share with you about where to purchase a stroller like this. Good luck!
